title: Chupacaubrey：正在修复IOS版的一个BUG
author: zx728925
txt_content:
QQ截图20171005115506.png (28.12 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2017-10-5 12:01 上传





Chupacaubrey：We are still working on the bug that's causing iOS chunk render distances to be locked at 6 - fix this one is coming in the next update.
Chupacaubrey：我们正在修复IOS版的区块渲染距离锁定为6的BUG - 在下一次更新中会被修复。

replies.author: nxy
replies.txt_content: 哼唧，现在iOS都玩不了国际版了呢QAQ

replies.txt_content:
